description: This dataset details the brownfields in the Chicago Southland region. The sites are all recipients of various Brownfield Assessment and Revolving Loan Funds administered by the ILEPA and SSMMA.

metadata.attribution: South Suburban Mayors and Managers Association

name: SSMMA Brownfields
